warezcdn.name: Udon no Kuni no Kiniro Kemari
warezcdn.title: Udon no kuni no kiniro kemari

imdb.title: Udon no kuni no kiniro kemari
imdb.plot: Souta Tawara, A young web designer comes to his hometown to escape the busy life of the city. He then stumbles upon a Young kid only to be surprised by the fact that he is a Tanuki (a magical creature) & then it becomes a journey ...

episodes.title: Episode 5 - Chicken on the Bone
episodes.plot: Buttering his longtime friend up with some bone-in chicken, Souta asks Nakajima to go with him to shoot a video for a class reunion. The two return to their old high school and end up reminiscing about the good old days.

episodes.title: Episode 6 - Tokyo Tower
episodes.plot: Souta takes Poco with him to Tokyo. When they step into the office, Poco becomes the center of attention. Souta begs his boss for an extension of his vacation, still torn about what to do. He wants to work, but what about Poco?

episodes.title: Ritsurin Garden
episodes.plot: Souta's made his decision: he's quitting his job and moving back to Kagawa, where he'll work freelance while taking care of Poco.
